about_the_game:
Dōbumon is a classic monster catching RPG in an isometric style of early handheld games.

Story

Ever since strange objects fell from the sky, people have been using fragments of them in order to enact a forced evolution on wild animals, gaining new and interesting forms and abilities. These forced-evolved creatures are known as "Dōbumon".

Gameplay Features

  • Begin your journey by choosing 1 of 3 starting Dōbumon, each with their unique skills and advantages
  • Build a team of up to 4 Dōbumon to fight on the battlefield together
  • Move your Dōbumon into more advantageous positions, while utilizing synergistic attacks that bring about a more complex battle system
  • Tame and fight with wide variety of dozens and dozens of Dōbumon
  • Utilizes an Action Point system, making every attack that you perform, count to the fullest.
  • Discover and choose from alternative evolutionary forms with different fragments, that help you build the perfect team that's suited for you

Explore

Choose 1 of 3 Dōbumon to start out on your adventure with, and then begin your journey to fight at the world tournament of Dōbumon. You'll be thrust into an adventure where along the way, you'll discover things aren't quite as they seem.


  • Explore several major cities in the world, full of interactions, quests, and collectibles
  • Discover the story behind these fragments that fell from the sky, and their implications
  • Meet friends and develop rivals as you explore the world of Dōbumon!

name: Dōbumon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX 6100
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dōbumon is an RPG monster collecting/battling game. Experience tactical battles as you choose 4 Dōbumon to fight with on the battlefield. Grow, evolve, and customize your attacks while developing different strategies in order to win, as you fight and explore your way to become the Dōbumon champion.
